title: Web Development with Node.js
introduction: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript runtime that allows developers to build scalable and high-performance applications. It uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it ideal for real-time applications.
details: With Node.js, developers can use JavaScript on both the client and server sides, making it a popular choice for full-stack web development. It comes with a vast ecosystem of modules and packages available through npm (Node Package Manager). Learning Node.js involves understanding asynchronous programming, handling HTTP requests, and using various built-in modules.
